titles.title: Praise The Savior, You Who Know Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise the Savior, you who know Him! Who can tell how much we owe Him? Gladly let us render to Him All we are and have.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep us, Lord, oh, keep us cleaving To Yourself and still believing, Till the hour of Your receiving The victorious bride.{/lang-eng}
